name: Easy as 1, 2, 3,
description:
You think you're a good typer.  Well, I challenge you to "Easy as 1, 2 ,3",  a stressful game where the rules are simple.  A number will appear on the screen and you need to type it. Sounds easy?? Well it's not. Now go and see if you can beat me!! (: 

My my personal high score is: 235.

Controls:

Quit: esc

Type: numPad 0-9
